page.title: 12Amenities and Lifestyle
page.content: {AMENITIES IN SW HAMILTON Since the area is largely rural, the number of amenities is small and conc- entrated in the area of residential housing.{ {SHOPS} There is one small purpose built centre at Woodhead. The rest of the shops are either the "corner shop" type of general store in the housing estates or shops built in Strathaven Road. There is no supermarket or large foodstore in the area. {TYPES OF ESTABLISHMENT} Most shops are general stores or newsagents. There is a number of carry out food shops and an assortment of DIY shops, greengrocers, etc. These are all run by their owners and their families. The carry out food shops are, with one exception, operated by Italian families.
